body:
I just encountered this problem, too.
The proposed solution by @josevalim is not work.
Since the root cause is from "assign_nested_attributes_for_collection_association" in activerecord/lib/active_record/nested_attributes.rb which @cmeiklejohn had mentioned at initial.

        if attributes['id'].blank?
          unless reject_new_record?(association_name, attributes)
            association.build(attributes.except(*unassignable_keys(assignment_opts)), assignment_opts)
          end
        elsif existing_record = existing_records.detect { |record| record.id.to_s == attributes['id'].to_s }
          ....
        elsif assignment_opts[:without_protection]
          association.build(attributes.except(*unassignable_keys(assignment_opts)), assignment_opts)
        else
          raise_nested_attributes_record_not_found(association_name, attributes['id'])
        end

You can see that without "without_protection" option, there's no chance to create associated object with specific id.
Otherwise the ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound will be raise

So could you please reconsider this pull request?
